tool_description: This API provides a straightforward method for downloading videos from Facebook. By supplying the Facebook video URL, users will receive a direct download link for the desired video.
name: Facebook Video Downloader API
title: Facebook Video Downloader API

api_list.name: Facebook Video Downloader API
api_list.description: This API provides a straightforward method for downloading videos from Facebook. By supplying the Facebook video URL, users will receive a direct download link for the desired video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com/facebook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com/facebook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
